With great composure, yet with a serious air to his expression, Tucson lowe=
rs his head to Leo Prime.  Nothing out of his mouth, not even a growl.  The=
n he raises his head somewhat with a reserved sigh.

" To assure the allian=
ce, you promised the Predacons a maximal stasis pod.  Why was this not brou=
ght to my attention directly?  And why did you agree with this bargain with=
out my consent?  I thought I could trust you, Leo but it seems that like Ro=
dimus, that air of trust simply isn't there.  I'm not at all pleased with w=
hat has come to my attention, and I demand that the bargain be revoked imme=
diately.  I also demand that you step down from command until further notic=
e.  A life is not a mode of currency that can be exchanged for cooperation.=
  We must earn that right with trust and the promise to follow through with=
 difficult challenges.   Now as of this moment, I request that Big Convoy a=
ssumes command beside me, since he has truly earned my trust during this ti=
me.   That's all I have to say, let's finish what we started, without havin=
g to pay with a life that is not our own."

All the while, his tone is kept=
 soft but with a very heavy heart.  He turns away from Leo, with his head l=
owered in disappointment.

Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grat=
eful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and =
friends.

On Dec 29, 2011, at 12:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@gmail=
.com> wrote:

<html><head></head><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>With great composure, yet=
 with a serious air to his expression, Tucson lowers his head to Leo Prime.=
  Nothing out of his mouth, not even a growl.  Then he raises his=
 head somewhat with a reserved sigh.</div><div><br></div><div>" To assure t=
he alliance, you promised the Predacons a maximal stasis pod.  Why was=
 this not brought to my attention directly?  And why did you agree wit=
h this bargain without my consent?  I thought I could trust you, Leo b=
ut it seems that like Rodimus, that air of trust simply isn't there.  =
I'm not at all pleased with what has come to my attention, and I demand tha=
t the bargain be revoked immediately.  I also demand that you step dow=
n from command until further notice.  A life is not a mode of currency=
 that can be exchanged for cooperation.  We must earn that right with =
trust and the promise to follow through with difficult challenges.   N=
ow as of this moment, I request that Big Convoy assumes command beside me, =
since he has truly earned my trust during this time.   That's all I ha=
ve to say, let's finish what we started, without having to pay with a life =
that is not our own."</div><div><br></div><div>All the while, his tone is k=
ept soft but with a very heavy heart.  He turns away from Leo, with hi=
s head lowered in disappointment.<br><br>Don't be envious of what you don't=
 have, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth mo=
re than family and friends.</div><div><br>On Dec 29, 2011, at 12:28 PM, Sup=

ail.com</a>> wrote:<br><br></div><div></div><blockquote type=3D"cite"><d=
